name: Strawberry Daiquiri
description: Shake and vape as is or add Koolada for a frozen cocktail.
author: ID10-T

reviews.text: Not a fan of lime tahity distilled.  Overpowers everything for me and tastes like a urinal cleaning agent smells.  Adding that to the list of my no-go concentrates.
Pretty much just as advertised.  I really like this one.  I'll have to try it with the Koolada next.
This recipe is a good one! This is definitely a chick drink you'd get from a bar but a perfect one for a hot day.
Yep. This tastes like something a chick would enjoy drinking. I honestly don't see much more to do here.
Glad you had me pick up the distilled lime, it may be my new favorite. This is a perfect recipe!
